sentences.en: Damages due to misuse and unauthorized modification of hardware.
sentences.cn: 人为因素造成之故障、损坏或改装.

sentences.en: Even harmless drugs can be misused.
sentences.cn: 即使是无毒副作用的药物也有使用不当的时候。

sentences.en: He has taken a public stand on the issue of misuse of hospital funds.
sentences.cn: 在滥用医院资金问题上,他采取公开的反对态度.

sentences.en: He was eventually convicted for the misuse of official funds.
sentences.cn: 最终他因滥用公款被判有罪。

sentences.en: He was sacked for computer misuse.
sentences.cn: 他因滥用计算机而被解雇了.

sentences.en: I noticed a misuse of the word " who " in your letter.
sentences.cn: 我发现在你的信中误用了 who 这个词.

sentences.en: Immeasurable quantity of natural resource was lost forever through misuse.
sentences.cn: 无法估量的自然资源因被滥用而永远丧失了.

sentences.en: It disturbs me profoundly that you so misuse your talents.
sentences.cn: 你如此滥用自己的才能,使我深感不安.

sentences.en: It is wrong to misuse our natural resources.
sentences.cn: 滥用我们的自然资源是不对的.

sentences.en: Such damage is usually found to have been caused by hydrometer misuse, especially with symthetic separators.
sentences.cn: 通常所发现的这种损坏是由于应用比重计不当造成的.

sentences.en: Such damage is usually found to have been caused by hydrometer misuse, especially with synthetic separators.
sentences.cn: 通常所发现的这种损坏是由于应用流速计不当造成的, 尤其是使用合成材料隔板.

sentences.en: The effectiveness of this class of drug has, however, led to their misuse.
sentences.cn: 不过，此类药品的显著疗效已经导致对其的滥用。

sentences.en: The intelligent dispenser system for CWS cotton towel rolls prevents misuse.
sentences.cn: CWS毛巾卷分配器的智能系统防止了滥用.

sentences.en: The natural resources of our country are leaking away through misuse.
sentences.cn: 我国的自然资源因滥用而慢慢地浪费掉.
“精神分裂症”这个术语经常被误用。

sentences.en: There is concern that the judges might misuse their power.
sentences.cn: 有人担心裁判员可能会滥用权力。

sentences.en: These lower costs may lead to ecologically harmful misuse.
sentences.cn: 费用减低可能导致生态上有害的滥用.

sentences.en: What are the procedures in place to prevent misuse of cash?
sentences.cn: 采取什么程序以防范滥用现金?

trans.tran_en: the use of something in the wrong way or for the wrong purpose
to use something for the wrong purpose, or in the wrong way, often with harmful results

trans.tran_cn: 使用…不当，把…派作不正当的用途，虐待，滥用
